description:
Celebrating over 35 Years of FUN!

Join millions of gamers worldwide in the most played video game of ALL TIME! Enjoy the BEST Solitaire card games & MORE in one app.

Relax & Enjoy the classics: Klondike Solitaire, Spider Solitaire, FreeCell Solitaire, TriPeaks Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire

Exercise your Mind: Playing features like Daily Challenges, Weekly Rewards & Events. 

Discover MORE great games: Microsoft Jewel 2, Microsoft Bubble, Microsoft Gravity Blocks, Mahjong 3D and others. All ready to play inside Microsoft Solitaire Collection!

With so many games to choose from, Microsoft Solitaire Collection is perfect for anyone, age 8 to 108. 

Create a Microsoft Account to save your progress, play on multiple devices or take Solitaire wherever you go. Connect with an Xbox Game Pass account or become a VIP player to enjoy an ad-free game experience plus other great Solitaire Premium Perks! 

Solitaire Premium Perks (also included in Game Pass)
•	Play Microsoft Solitaire Collection ad-free
•	(PC only) Play MORE games ad-free within Solitaire including Jewel, Jewel 2, Bubble, Mahjong 3D, Gem Drop, and Gravity Blocks
•	Unlimited access to Solitaire Solver (ad-free)
•	Access over 14,000+ past Daily Challenges
•	Get 14 FREE Card Backs 
•	Earn EXTRA bonuses as you play other games inside Solitaire

Celebrate over 35 years of the BEST Solitaire & Casual Games, right here, in Microsoft Solitaire Collection!
title: Microsoft Solitaire Collection
